inclusion.criterion: Stable chest pain syndrome (typical or atypical) or anginal equivalent in the judgment of the investigator (e.g., pain in the neck, jaw, arm or shoulder or dyspnea possibly due to cardiac ischemia).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient has signed the appropriate Institutional Review Board approved Informed Consent Form.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of known MI or significant CAD.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current MI or acute coronary syndrome.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe regurgitant or stenotic cardiac valvular lesion.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, but no current MI or acute coronary syndrome. He also has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis.
